Attacks.Name: Water Pulse
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Drenched special condition, reducing their defense by 1 until the end of their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Bubble
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, apply the Slow special condition to the target character, reducing their movement by S during their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Frogadier
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to all characters within range 1 of the target character. If a wild is rolled, also apply the Wet special condition to those characters, causing them to slip and lose their next move action.

Superpowers.Name: Quick Leap
Superpowers.Effect: Froakie makes an immediate move action. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Superpowers.Name: Camouflage
Superpowers.Effect: When targeted by an attack, if there is terrain or another character within range 1, reduce the attack's damage by 1.

Attacks.Name: Acrobatics
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Froakie may make an immediate move action.

Superpowers.Name: Escape Artist
Superpowers.Effect: Remove one special condition from Froakie. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Frogadier character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
